title: Bug 113047: No children node listing when changing data source for a dataset in the dataset editor page of the query tab.
OB: When changing the data source for a dataset in the dataset editor page of the query tab, there is no listing of children nodes. Close the dataset editor and reopen it.
EB: When changing the data source for a dataset in the dataset editor page of the query tab, the children nodes should be listed.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Create a new dataset without an SQL statement. 
2. Open the dataset editor and go to the data source page. 
3. Change the data source. 
4. Verify that the new data source's database, table, and column information are not listed. 
5. Close the dataset editor and reopen it to check if the children nodes are now listed.
